# defroster

**Instance Property**

The defroster to enable or disable.

## Declaration

```swift
var defroster: INCarDefroster { get }
```

## Getting Details About the Defroster Settings to Set

- **enable**: A Boolean indicating whether to enable or disable the defroster.
